pageContext.title: The fundamentals of the game involve throwing the ball
pageContext.excerpt: Baseball is a game played with a bat, ball and glove. The fundamentals of the game involve throwing the ball, hitting the ball, and catching the ball. Of course, the execution of these three tasks is more challenging than it sounds, and it is that challenge that compels baseball players to play the game. In this article, we will …
